    457. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def build_tasks_query(base_query)
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply status filtering
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 6
                
              
            

                    if params[:status].present?
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      case params[:status]
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                      when "pending"
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "pending")
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      when "completed", "done"
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "done")
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      when "overdue"
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where("due_at < ?", Time.current).where.not(status: "done")
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply list filtering for all_tasks
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                    if params[:list_id].present?
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.where(list_id: params[:list_id])
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply sorting - use hash syntax to prevent SQL injection
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    sort_by = params[:sort_by] || "created_at"
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    sort_order = params[:sort_order] || "desc"
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Whitelist valid columns and directions
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    valid_columns = %w[created_at updated_at due_at title]
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    valid_directions = %w[asc desc]
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    if valid_columns.include?(sort_by) && valid_directions.include?(sort_order)
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 7
                
              
            

                      # Use hash syntax instead of string interpolation
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order(sort_by.to_sym => sort_order.to_sym)
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    base_query
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def per_page_limit
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    per_page = params[:per_page].to_i
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  then: 6
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                    per_page = 25 if per_page == 0 # Default to 25 if not specified
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496.

              def paginate(query, page:, per_page:, default_per_page: DEFAULT_PER_PAGE, max_per_page: MAX_PER_PAGE)

              def order(query, order_by:, order_direction:, valid_columns:, default_column: :created_at, default_direction: :desc)

              def normalize_positive_int(value, fallback:)

    64. 
            

            
              
            

                i = value.to_i

    65. 
            

            
              
            

                i.positive? ? i : fallback

              def normalize_per_page(value, default_per_page:, max_per_page:)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                pp = value.to_i
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                pp = default_per_page if pp <= 0
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                [ pp, max_per_page ].min
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # Database deadlocks are transient
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # If a record was deleted before the job runs, drop it
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10.

              # Retry only known transient network errors (not all StandardError)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              TRANSIENT_ERRORS = [
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Timeout::Error,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                Errno::ECONNRESET,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                Errno::ECONNREFUSED,
          
      15.

                Errno::ETIMEDOUT,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                SocketError,

      18.

                Net::ReadTimeout
          
      19.

              ].freeze

              TRANSIENT_ERRORS.each do |klass|

    app/jobs/nudge_job.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

      3.

            class NudgeJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :notifications, retry: 3, backtrace: true
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_retry_in do |count, exception|
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                case exception
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                when ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  0 # task/user/list deleted -> don't retry
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  # backoff: 30s, 60s, 90s (capped)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ 30 * (count + 1), 300 ].min
          
      15.

              def overdue?
          
      156.

                pending? && due_at.present? && due_at < Time.current

              def subtask_completion_percentage

                return 0 if subtasks.empty?

              def visible_to?(user)

      201.

                case visibility
          
      205.

      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              8

      208.

                  list.accessible_by?(user) && (creator == user || list.user == user)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "hidden_from_coaches"
          
      210.

                  list.accessible_by?(user) && (creator == user || list.user == user)

      212.

      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0

      214.

      215.

              def recurrence_interval_not_blank
          
      246.

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 401

              def recurrence_time_format
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              401
            

            
              
                
                  else: 9
                
              
                
                  then: 392
                
              
            

                return unless recurrence_time.present?
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              9
            

            
              
                
                  then: 9
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                time_str = recurrence_time.is_a?(Time) ? recurrence_time.strftime("%H:%M") : recurrence_time.to_s
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              9
            

            
              
                
                  else: 9
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                unless time_str.match?(/\A([01]?[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]\z/)
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:recurrence_time, "must be in HH:MM format")
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      258.

              def handle_status_change_callbacks
          
      261.

                recorder = TaskEventRecorder.new(self)

      263.

                recorder.check_parent_completion
          
      264.

              end
          
      265.

              def due_at_not_in_past_on_create
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
              401
            

            
              
                
                  else: 332
                
              
                
                  then: 69
                
              
            

                return unless new_record?
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
              332
            

            
              
                
                  else: 331
                
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                return unless due_at.present?
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
              331

                # Use provided coordinates or get from current location

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                # Haversine formula - returns distance in meters
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius = 6371000 # meters
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                lat1_rad = lat1 * Math::PI / 180
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                lat2_rad = lat2 * Math::PI / 180
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                delta_lat = (lat2 - lat1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                delta_lon = (lon2 - lon1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(delta_lat / 2) ** 2 +
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.cos(lat1_rad) * Math.cos(lat2_rad) *
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.sin(delta_lon / 2) ** 2
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a))
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius * c
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def valid_timezone
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              599
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 599
                
              
            

                return if timezone.blank?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              599
            

            
              
            

                  Time.zone = timezone
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              598
            

            
              
            

                  Time.zone
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:timezone, "is not a valid timezone")
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174.

                  else: 574
                
              
            

                self.role = "client" if role.blank?
          
      177.

      178.

                def resolve

                def visible_list_ids

              def derive_priority
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              15
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 15
                
              
            

                return 3 if task.strict_mode && overdue?  # Urgent
          
      82.

              14

              def overdue?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                # Task is overdue if it has a due date in the past and is NOT completed

    89. 
            
              31
            

            
              
            

                task.due_at.present? &&

                (task.status.nil? || task.status == "pending" || task.status == "in_progress")

              def subtasks_completed_count

                task.subtasks.where(status: "done").count

              def subtask_percentage

                  then: 15
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 if subtasks_count.zero?

                (subtasks_completed_count.to_f / subtasks_count * 100).round

              def completed_at_value
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use the actual completed_at field if it exists, otherwise fall back to updated_at
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              15
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 14
                
              
            

                if task.status == "done"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  task.completed_at&.iso8601 || task.updated_at.iso8601
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil

    163.

    app/serializers/user_serializer.rb

                def load_ec_key_from_string!(p8_contents)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  key = OpenSSL::PKey.read(p8_contents)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless key.is_a?(OpenSSL::PKey::EC) && key.private?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ArgumentError, "APNS_AUTH_KEY_B64 must decode to an EC private key (.p8) with a private component"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  key
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                def jwt!
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  now = Time.now.to_i
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  synchronize do
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @jwt.nil? || (now - @jwt_iat) >= TOKEN_TTL_SECONDS
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      headers = { kid: @key_id, alg: "ES256", typ: "JWT" }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                      claims  = { iss: @team_id, iat: now }
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                      @jwt     = JWT.encode(claims, @p8_key, "ES256", headers)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                      @jwt_iat  = now
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    @jwt

    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  end

                end
          
      124.

                def with_redis_lock(key, token:, ttl:)

    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  return yield_and_true unless Sidekiq.respond_to?(:redis)

                  acquired = false

                  Sidekiq.redis do |conn|

                    acquired = conn.set(key, token, nx: true, ex: ttl)

                        current = conn.get(key)

                  def self.title_and_body(task:, reason:)

                    task_title = truncate(task.title.to_s, 50)

      29.

                    if task.respond_to?(:done?) && task.done?

                      [ "Task Completed", "Completed: #{task_title}" ]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    elsif reason.present?
          
      32.

      33.

                      [ "Task Reassigned", "Reassigned: #{task_title}  #{r}" ]

                    else
          
      35.

                      [ "Task Reminder", "Due soon: #{task_title}" ]
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      37.

              def parse_coordinate!(value, field:, min:, max:)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                if value.nil? || value.to_s.strip.empty?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise ValidationError.new(
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    "#{field.to_s.humanize} is required",
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    details: { field => [ "required" ] }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                num = Float(value)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                unless num >= min && num <= max
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise ValidationError.new(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                    "#{field.to_s.humanize} is out of range",
          
      61.

      62.

      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  accuracy: accuracy,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  recorded_at: Time.current
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find location-based tasks for this user
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(lists: { user_id: user.id })
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(location_based: true)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(completed_at: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] Found #{location_tasks.count} location-based tasks"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks.find_each do |task|
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_task_location(task, latitude, longitude, user)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] User ##{user_id} not found"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error: #{e.message}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37.

              def check_task_location(task, user_lat, user_lng, user)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate distance from user to task location
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ user_lat, user_lng ],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  units: :km
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                ) * 1000 # Convert to meters
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                is_within = distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get user's previous location to determine if arriving or departing
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                previous_location = user.user_locations
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where("recorded_at < ?", 5.minutes.ago)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .first
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                was_within = if previous_location
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ previous_location.latitude, previous_location.longitude ],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                                 units: :km
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                               ) * 1000
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                               false
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                # Determine event
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                if is_within && !was_within && task.notify_on_arrival?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just arrived at location
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User arrived at location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :arrival)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif !is_within && was_within && task.notify_on_departure?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just left location
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User departed from location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :departure)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error checking task ##{task.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      83.

    app/workers/recurring_task_generator_worker.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    92 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 92 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed.

            class RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Starting recurring task generation at #{Time.current}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find all recurring templates
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                templates = Task.templates.includes(:list, :recurring_instances)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Found #{templates.count} recurring templates"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                templates.find_each do |template|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  generate_instances_for_template(template)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Completed recurring task generation"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21.

              private

              def generate_instances_for_template(template)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate when the next instance should be due
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                next_due = template.calculate_next_due_date
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless next_due
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if we've reached the end date
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                if template.recurrence_end_date.present? && next_due > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Template ##{template.id} has reached end date"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate instances for the next 7 days
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                instances_to_generate = []
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                current_date = next_due
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                7.times do
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if template.recurrence_end_date.present? && current_date > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if instance already exists for this date
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  existing = template.recurring_instances.find_by(
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    "DATE(due_at) = ?", current_date.to_date
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  if existing.nil?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    instances_to_generate << current_date
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Calculate next date based on pattern
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_date = advance_date(current_date, template)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create the instances
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                instances_to_generate.each do |due_date|
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  create_instance(template, due_date)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                if instances_to_generate.any?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Generated #{instances_to_generate.count} instances for template ##{template.id}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Error processing template ##{template.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

              def create_instance(template, due_date)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                # Set the time component if specified
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                if template.recurrence_time.present?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  due_date = due_date.change(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    hour: template.recurrence_time.hour,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    min: template.recurrence_time.min
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                instance = template.recurring_instances.create!(
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  list: template.list,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  creator: template.creator,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  title: template.title,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  description: template.description,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  due_at: due_date,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  priority: template.priority,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_be_snoozed: template.can_be_snoozed,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  notification_interval_minutes: template.notification_interval_minutes,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  requires_explanation_if_missed: template.requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  location_based: template.location_based,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  location_latitude: template.location_latitude,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  location_longitude: template.location_longitude,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  location_radius_meters: template.location_radius_meters,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                  location_name: template.location_name,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  notify_on_arrival: template.notify_on_arrival,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  notify_on_departure: template.notify_on_departure
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Created instance ##{instance.id} for template ##{template.id}, due #{due_date}"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify the user about the new task
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                NotificationService.recurring_task_generated(instance)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                instance
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              def advance_date(date, template)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                case template.recurrence_pattern
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                when "daily"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.days
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                when "weekly"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = date + template.recurrence_interval.weeks
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  # If specific days are set, advance to next matching day
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  if template.recurrence_days.present?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    while !template.recurrence_days.include?(next_date.wday)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      next_date += 1.day
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                when "monthly"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.months
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                when "custom"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.days
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + 1.day
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      127.

            class TaskCompletionHandlerWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(task_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                task = Task.find(task_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Processing completion for task ##{task_id}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clear escalation
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.escalation
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.escalation.clear!
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Cleared escalation for task ##{task_id}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify coaches
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.created_by_coach?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.task_completed(task)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Notified coaches of completion"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate next recurring instance if applicable
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.recurring_template.present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_instance = task.recurring_template.generate_next_instance
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  if next_instance
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Generated next recurring instance ##{next_instance.id}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if parent task should be completed (all subtasks done)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.parent_task_id.present?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  parent = task.parent_task
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  if parent.all_subtasks_completed? && parent.completed_at.nil?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    parent.complete!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Auto-completed parent task ##{parent.id}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Task ##{task_id} not found"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Error: #{e.message}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                raise # Retry
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      48.
